name: germinoma
definition: A germ cell cancer that lacks histologic differentiation. It usually refers to a tumor in the brain. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germinoma, url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germinoma]

clinicalTrials.title: Radiation Therapy in Treating Patients With Recurrent Brain Tumors Who Have Undergone Previous Radiation Therapy
